title: Digital Marketing & Brand Officer Job at Elites Holdings
content:
Elites Holdings is a group of companies comprising of Elites reality limited, Elites Chauffuer limited and Elites Agro farm and feedmills limited.. We offer quality services to both corporate organizations and private individuals. Our services include real estate development and advisory services, affordable and reliable car rental for commercial or personal use, and poultry farming and processing of broiler chickens for wholesale and retail supply. We pride ourselves on being an innovative, creative, people-oriented company providing cross-training skill, self-development, and growth to all employees.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketing & Brand Officer
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Hybrid (Onsite & Remote)

Job Summary


	We are seeking a talented and driven Digital Marketing & Brand Officer to lead our digital marketing and branding efforts.
	The ideal candidate will develop and implement strategic campaigns that enhance our brand presence, engage our audiences, and drive measurable business outcomes.
	This role bridges marketing, communications, and design—managing content, maintaining brand consistency, and supporting cross-functional initiatives across departments.


Key Responsibilities
Digital Marketing & Communications:


	Plan and execute digital campaigns across SEO, PPC, email marketing, display ads, and social media.
	Manage and update website content via CMS platforms; optimize for SEO and performance.
	Build and maintain a strong social media presence (LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, X/Twitter, etc.).
	Monitor, analyze, and report on key digital metrics (traffic, engagement, conversion, ROI).


Brand Management:


	Ensure brand consistency across all digital and physical materials.
	Develop and implement brand guidelines and toolkits.
	Collaborate with design teams to produce brand-aligned marketing assets.


Content Creation:


	Create and curate content (copy, visuals, videos) for websites, blogs, social media, newsletters, and campaigns.
	Work with internal teams and external vendors to develop compelling, brand-aligned storytelling.


Collaboration & Support:


	Partner with departments like Sales, Product, and HR to support internal and external branding campaigns.
	Assist in organizing marketing events, sponsorship activations, and PR initiatives.


Requirements
Education & Experience:


	Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Communications, Digital Media, or a related field.
	Minimum of 4 years of relevant experience in digital marketing, branding, or corporate communications.


Skills & Competencies:


	Proficient in Google Analytics, Meta Ads Manager, and WhatsApp Ad Manager.
	Hands-on experience with CMS platforms (e.g., WordPress), email marketing tools, and Adobe Creative Suite.
	Exceptional writing, editing, and storytelling ability.
	Ability to juggle multiple projects and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
	Creative, detail-oriented, and a strategic thinker.


Preferred Qualifications:


	Experience in advertising or related industry is an advantage.
	Basic knowledge of HTML/CSS or video editing.
	Familiarity with Google Ads, HubSpot, or similar CRM and automation platforms.


Salary
N180,000 - N220,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and portfolio to: hr@elitesholdingsng.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Secretary Job at Ascentech Services Limited
content:
Ascentech Services Limited is a full-fledged Human Resource Solution Provider incorporated in 2013 with its Head Office in Lagos, Nigeria. We are committed to forging long-term partnerships with our clients by creating and delivering robust and flexible services that address the changing needs of their business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Secretary
Job Location: Oshodi, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Overview
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a highly organized Secretary with 3-5 years of experience.
	The ideal candidate must have Strong communication and organizational skills


Key Responsibilities


	Prepare and organize documents, reports, and meeting materials.
	Handle internal and external communications, including phone calls and emails.
	Assist in basic accounting tasks, including invoicing and expense tracking.
	Coordinate office supplies and equipment maintenance.
	Take meeting minutes and follow up on action items.


Qualifications


	Minimum of OND Certificate
	3-5 years of experience in a similar role
	Strong computer skills, including proficiency in MS Office
	Excellent communication and organizational skills.
	Ability to handle confidential information with discretion.


Salary
N128,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CVs to: cv@ascentech.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
